command_list.command: item replace entity @s weapon.mainhand with minecraft:netherite_sword{Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:fire_aspect",lvl:5}],incendium:{item:"warping_witherblade"},CustomModelData:1450001,display:{Name:'{"text":"扭曲——下界合金剑","color":"#330099"}'}}

item replace entity @s weapon.offhand with minecraft:netherite_sword{Enchantments:[{id:"miningmaster:freezing",lvl:3}],"quark:RuneAttached":1b,"quark:RuneColor": {id:"quark:brown_rune",Count:1b},incendium:{item:"greatsword_of_sacrifice"},CustomModelData:1450004,display:{Name:'{"text":"献祭——下界合金剑","color":"#FF0000"}'}}
